title: Does anyone know if i can play league of legends on linux?(ubuntu)
body:
Well im trying to find a way to play league of legends on linux(ubuntu)...if anyone know how can i do this please answer i need help :) 
i have tried lost of methods without any result yet..

replies.body:
I love Linux and am a huge fan of Ubuntu! :)

While there's no official support for playing on Linux, I know a large number of players find success running League through [PlayonLinux](https://www.playonlinux.com/en/). If you need assistance with setup or troubleshooting, you should be able to find some comprehensive tutorials on youtube, or you could reach out on the [PlayonLinux Forums](https://www.playonlinux.com/en/forums.html).

Good luck in your efforts, Linux friend! Let me know if you have any other questions.

First of all thanks for you support :) i really appreciate it :) I'm running league of legends on  PlayonLinux for a long time now.The problem is that sometimes when i play i have some big lags like 2000 ms..and its not my net's fault for sure.I have ubuntu 16.04 LTS. Let me know if you can help me :))) thanks for the support again :)

Huge changes in latency (ping) are typically caused by your local network settings or ISP routing to the server. Our guides are intended for Windows/Mac OS, but a lot of the steps in them translate over fairly well. Check out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some good starting steps in resolving your latency issues.

Let me know if you continue to see issues after working through that guide.
